ingredients: 2 small zucchini (chopped into ½ inch half moons) - microwave or steam until almost done
(something for spice might be nice - jalapeno to add when sautéing peppers?)
instructions: Slice peppers, onion, season with salt sauté in oil
Once peppers and onion soft, add ginger, garlic, and seasonings
Add tomato sauce, zucchini - let simmer for 15 - 20 min to reduce acidity.
Add kidney beans and heat through.
Chop parsley and mix in gently off heat.
